page.title: 09Local Govt. LparishHPriors
page.content: 04400144 Each of the villages of Lparish and HPriors have their own{Parish {Councils.}We asked each one about their responsibilities and their main concerns in 1985.The chairperson of Lparish told us that the Council is concered with:- 1) The establishment of the ownership of common land of the village 2)The upkeep of parish property e.g.bus shelters 3)Maintenance and additions to the equipment of the {Recreation Ground}. .HPriors Council has applied for the village to become a Conservation Area. councillors had hoped to have a speed limit restriction, but the Highways Authority said the accident rate was . not high enough to warrant one.
